oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Blue and Gray Barbecue" program
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Blue and Gray Barbecue" program, belonging to Pvt. Samuel Wallace Duncan (September 12, 1845-May 28, 1915), Co. M, 7th Penn. Vol. Cav. Regt., USA. The reunion was the first joint gathering of Confederate and Federal veterans organized in Tennessee. Attendance was estimated to have been between 15,000-20,000 people with 14,000 of those being veterans. Response to the welcome was offered by Gen. W. S. Rosecrans. See items chat148 and chat149 to view images of the event.
